name: The Follower (Enedee)
description:
"Your enemy is your guide"

An experiment has gone horribly wrong at the Underground Anomaly Research Facility,  and a creature has broken free. The power has gone out, and as a scientist believed to be the only survivor of the incident, you must find your way out of the facility, using the creature's light to guide yourself to the exit. But don't stick too close to its light...or you won't make it out.

Enedee - Code, Design, Art

W3IRD - Character design, Character art

MrMeatball - Key art, Logo
